useCase.name: Accessing and Displaying Files
useCase.description: As an archivist, I want to access and display files from the X-drive.

preconditions.precondition: The Archivist's credentials are validated successfully.
The Archivist has appropriate permissions to access files on X-drive.

successEndConditions.condition: The Archivist successfully accesses and displays files from X-drive.

useCase.trigger: Archivist requests access to X-drive and the sequence begins.

mainSequence.step: User Management System Retrieves Archivist Permissions.
File Management System Fetches Files from X-drive.
File Management System Displays Files to Archivist.
